content.text: Hi there! How was your day?
It was good! I just finished a long ride on my favorite horse.
I'd like to be able to make more warm clothes to wear.
Oh, that's a cool hobby. I'm not very crafty.
I worry about my image. I'm always trying to look my best.
I think you look great! You don't need to worry about anything.
Thank you so much! I'm glad you think so.
I'm single and focused on my career. I work in a doctors office. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay at home mom. I love spending time with my kids and making them happy.
That's great! I love my parents very much and am grateful for all they have done for me.
I love my parents too. They're the best.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! We should hang out sometime.
